name: brachot-JewishBlessings
0:
”Alexa, open jewish brachot”
”Alexa, start jewish brachot”
”Alexa, run jewish brachot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jewish brachot
des: At times, it can be hard to be grateful and to lift our eyes up. These brachot - or Jewish blessings help to teach us to bless the Lord in many ways that we may not think about. As time goes on, the more we bless the Lord for the seeming mundane, the more joyful we start to become. May your heart grow in thankfulness as you turn your eyes to Adonai, the source of all blessings!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
